name: FrogPack
description:
FrogPack is a game about a ninja frog with a jetpack who throws shuriken.
I developed this little game with Construct3 (free version) in few housr just for fun. I never used Construct3 before so I just wanted to try and learn this engine and his function, and I got to say that was fun!
I hope you enjoy playing this game <3

- Mouse click left to fly
- Spacebar for Shuriken

Programming, music and sounds by me.
Art by Pixel Frog, o_lobster and Nectanebo
